# Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(party)
```

# Load Data

```{r include=FALSE}
dat <- read.csv("./data/cleaveland_with_header.csv")
```

```{r}
print(dat)
```

```{r}
names(dat)
```

```{r}
print(dat$target)
```

```{r}
dat %>% gather() %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=value)) + 
  geom_histogram(fill="steelblue", alpha=.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_wrap(~key, scales="free")
```
